articles.title: Richardine Bartee bags recording academy membership - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Acclaimed Publisher and African music ambassador, Richardine Bartee, has joined the league of African Americans inducted into the Recording Academy’s (organisers of the Grammy) membership committee.
articles.content: Acclaimed Publisher and African music ambassador, Richardine Bartee, has joined the league of African Americans inducted into the Recording Academys (organisers of the Grammy) membership committee. … [+845 chars]
